ActNational Energy Board Act
PrecisApproval for the issuance to TRANSCANADA KEYSTONE PIPELINE GP LTD. of a Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity (No. OC-51) for the Keystone Pipeline Project that consist of a 1,235 km oil pipeline which would extend from Hardisty, Alberta to a location near Haskett, Manitoba at the border between Canada and the U.S.
